person.persName: Edwin S. Craig (Commonwealth’s Attorney for the Seventh Judicial District )

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Elisa M. Craig. Father of Mason Craig and Belle Craig. Commonwealth’s Attorney for the Seventh Judicial District until 1861. Practiced law in partnership with Robert J. Elliott.
